site.title: Jair Revilla - Moodle Expert & Plugin Developer
site.description: Specialist Moodle Engineer focused on high-performance, custom plugin development, and corporate integrations. 12+ years optimizing eLearning platforms.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: Software Engineer passionate about eLearning and the Moodle ecosystem. I have dedicated over a decade to creating robust and scalable educational solutions.
contact.title: Contact
contact.desc: Do you have a challenging project in mind? Let's talk.
testimonials.title: What my clients say

testimonials.items.quote: Jair optimized our Moodle platform to support 50,000 concurrent users without downtime. His database knowledge is impressive.
testimonials.items.author: Maria Gonzalez

testimonials.items.quote: The geolocation attendance plugin he developed transformed our academic management. Clean, secure, and well-documented code.
testimonials.items.author: Carlos Ruiz

testimonials.items.quote: Integrating SAP with Moodle seemed impossible until Jair designed the architecture. Synchronization is seamless and real-time.
testimonials.items.author: Ana Perez
